column11: EVENT TEXT
column137: NEARBY SHIP DRONE CONTROL SYSTEM CAPACITY
column138: NEARBY SHIP DRONE CONTROL SYSTEM POWER
column139: NEARBY SHIP DRONE CONTROL SYSTEM DAMAGE
column194: HULL DAMAGE NEEDED FOR ESCAPE ATTEMPT

column11: The data you carry is vital to the remaining Federation fleet. You'll need supplies for the journey, so make sure to explore each sector before moving on to the next. But get to the exit before the pursuing Rebel fleet can catch up!  TIP: Rebel Fleet -  The Rebel fleet (represented by the red circle on the map) moves closer to your position every time you jump. Certain events can slow or speed up their movement.
The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
As you wait for the FTL drive to charge, you half expect to be ambushed at any moment. However, no attack comes...
The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
Without active sensors you have no other option but to look out of the view-ports in apprehension. It's eerily quiet.
Their ship breaks apart and you are relieved to know that you are still one step ahead of the fleet.

Your crew tries to keep the crowds in line but the scene quickly turns ugly. Half-crazed with fear, the infected grab mining tools and push back at your crew, forcing them to retreat hastily. They barely get away without injury but the same can't be said for the colony's leaders. You quickly leave.
The space station here has a traveling merchant who shows you his wares.
column12: Crew: Zoltan, Mantis, Rock, System: drones, cloaking, mind,

column11: Take this bit of scrap as a down-payment. We'll use your jump signatures to follow you. You're really helping us out here. Added a quest marker to your map!
A ship engineer has set up a small shop here.
column12: Drone: BOARDER ION, REPAIR, ANTI DRONE, Augment: ION ARMOR, HACKING STUN, ZOLTAN BYPASS, Weapon: LASER BURST 2 A, ION 2, BOMB HEAL SYSTEM, System: drones, teleporter, hacking,

column11: You let their team on board and after a short time they finish their work.
This sector has been largely abandoned since a series of battles decimated the local population. An unusual alien race is reportedly scavenging in the area. You'd best be on guard.

The charts indicate this was the location of a small skirmish over a military facility on a nearby moon. Oddly, scans pick up no signs of debris from either the battle or the station. Yet another area sucked dry by the Lanius.
The ship explodes, revealing their cargo of unprocessed metal. You collect a significant amount of scrap.
The Rockmen give an awkwardly-translated message that seems to indicate something about gratitude. They then jump away without another word.

A large transport ship undergoing maintenance hails you. Greetings, friend. We're getting out of this sector as soon as this Coolant Shaft is fixed and I suggest you do the same. I half expect those damn metal freaks to come and try to melt down our ship at any moment. We're trying to offload some inventory - interested in buying something?
column12: Crew: Mantis, Human, Lanius, System: drones, battery, mind, Weapon: SHOTGUN, LASER HEAVY 2, BOMB ION, Drone: DEFENSE 1, COMBAT BEAM 2, COMBAT 1,

column11: This beacon is bustling with activity. It looks like some merchants decided to capitalize on the fact that dozens of refugee ships are using this location to recharge their FTL drives. You browse their wares.
column12: System: drones, cloaking, battery, Weapon: LASER BURST 5, MISSILES HULL, LASER CHAINGUN, Drone: DRONE SHIELD, DEFENSE 1, SHIP REPAIR, Crew: Lanius, Mantis, Lanius,

column11: The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.

An image of some weak and hungry humans comes onto your screen. Those metal bastards think they can just absorb half of our engines and leave us here to die? I hope you understand the need to take your ship by force. They must have a Super Shield bypass unit; boarders are on board!

An image of some weak and hungry humans comes onto your screen. Those metal bastards think they can just absorb half of our engines and leave us here to die? I hope you understand the need to take your ship by force. They must have a Super Shield bypass unit; boarders are on board!

You stumble across a badly damaged Lanius craft. It jumps away as soon as it sees you. Looking around the area, you discover a number of destroyed Rebel automated ships. It must have been quite the fight. You scrap what remains.
The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
The ship appears to have been transporting prisoners. Unfortunately they were all killed in the battle. You salvage what you can.
The Zoltan patrol their borders but let you pass when you ID as Federation. Let's hope they won't be so courteous to the Rebels.

You use your ion weaponry to disable the gun long enough for their repair crews to fix it. They message you, I've never seen a weapon like that before! Thanks for your help. Please accept this reward.
The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
The ship obliterated, only scant fuel canisters can be scavenged from the wreckage before the ion storm clears and you have to jump away.

You approach the planet carefully, trying to keep your ship from breaking up in orbit. The monolith, whatever it is, must sense as much because the next thing you know you have enough scrap to patch up your damage and more besides!
The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
A Mantis crew here has hunkered down in the abdomen of a long-dead space-whale - the only way, presumably, for them to operate their black-market trade without detection. Worth a look?
column12: System: drones, mind, hacking, Weapon: MISSILES BREACH, ION 1, LASER BURST 2 A,

column11: The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
Thank you for your business, no refunds!
A human ship hails: My friends! Please, there is nothing I don't have, and there is nothing worth wanting that I can't get. Why not take a look around my shop?
column12: System: drones, battery, mind, Augment: SCRAP COLLECTOR, FTL BOOSTER, ZOLTAN BYPASS,

column11: An abandoned space station circles a lonely planet. A quick check yields schematics for a drone. You bring it aboard the ship.
The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
You inform a nearby station of your flight from the Rebels. They offer to outfit your ship with a weapon and wish you well.
You've entered a poorly charted area of space that's known to be home to the Mantis. Ensure your hull plating is up to scratch and that you have enough fuel in the tank to make it through.
The ship explodes, leaving behind a substantial collection of useful scrap material.
